item.title: Elasticsearch | Stash
item.description: Backup and Restore Elasticsearch database using Stash Stash 0.9.0+ supports backup and restoration of Elasticsearch clusters. This guide will show you how you can backup and restore your Elasticsearch database with Stash. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using Minikube.
